channel.title: Data Science on Andres Jeronimo Escobar Giraldo

item.title: Real Estate Dashboard
item.description: This project is a Streamlit dashboard where investors can analyse their personal protfolios and future aquisitions This dashboard includes two sections: General portfolio In this section we have general portfolio information: net value, KPIs and a map to analysis geogephical information of properties Individual analysis In this section investors can get specific metrics for aquired and non aquired properties, the property to analyze can be selected in a dropdown menu, the properties shown in this can be filtered using filters located in site’s sidebar.
